unalcol.math.function.iterative

Class Iterative<I,O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.math.function.Function<I,O>
      • unalcol.math.function.iterative.Iterative<I,O>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Traceable

    public class Iterative<I,O>
extends Function<I,O>

    Abstract version of an iterative algorithm.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Iterative

        public Iterative(StepFunction<I,O> step,
                 Predicate<Function<I,O>> condition,
                 long delay)
        Constructor: Creates an iterative algorithm with the given continuation condition
        Parameters:
        condition - The algorithm stop condition (the algorithm is executed until the condition is false)
        delay - Elapsed time between iterations (millisecs)

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public O apply(I input)
        Executes the iterative algorithm. Keeps a vector with the results of each iteration of the algorithm
        Specified by:
        apply in class Function<I,O>
        Parameters:
        input - Input of the algorithm
        Returns:
        Output produced by the algorithm
